long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension is a simple yet effective tool that allows users to switch to the last tab they were on, with just a simple key combination of "Ctrl + `". This extension comes in handy for those who constantly work with multiple tabs open and need to switch back and forth between them quickly.

Once installed, the extension runs in the background, waiting for the user to press the designated key combination. When triggered, the extension will instantly switch the user to the last tab they were on, allowing them to pick up right where they left off without having to manually search for the tab.

Overall, this extension provides a time-saving and convenient solution for users who regularly use multiple tabs in their browsing or work routine. It's a great tool for boosting productivity and streamlining workflows in Chrome.
